omin.core.base¶

Provides, base class used in the Container classes.

class omin.core.base.Handle¶

The core omin handle base class.

numbers¶

dict – DEPRECATE

metadata¶

data

type¶

type

omin.core.base.export(obj, desired_type=None, parent_dir=None)¶

Export all attributes of an object that are DataFrames as csv files.

omin.core.base.repr_dec(cls)¶

Replace the __repr__ function of a given class with the repr_wrapper.

When a class is decorated with this function each instance of that class will print a list of it’s attributes along with that attributes type. Hopefully this will make navigating through class instances easier.

Parameters:cls (class) –
Returns:cls – With modified __repr__ function.
Return type:class
